Plot: An extremely captivating movie on how a little girl copes with her mother's death. She withdraws from all the people around her, waiting for her mother to come back. She tries waiting, and ...
Title: Ponette
Writer: Jacques Doillon, Brune Compagnon (scenario collaborator: for first draft)
Actors: Victoire Thivisol, Delphine Schiltz, Matiaz Bureau Caton, Léopoldine Serre
